entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of snow near midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount possibly more than 10 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
